block.p: Elisabeth Gindrat Thorington, a daughter of Winifred Ann Pilcher Thorington and Robert D. Thorington of Montgomery, Ala., was married yesterday to Stephen Arthur Mongillo III, a son of Mary Gail Scanlon Mongillo and Mr. Mongillo of Hamden, Conn. The Rev. Craig Townsend performed the ceremony at St. James' Episcopal Church in New York.

Ms. Thorington, who is keeping her name, is a regional manager of underwriting for Merrill Lynch & Company in New York. She graduated from Duke University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania. Her father is the senior partner in Thorington & Gregory, a Montgomery law firm.

Elisabeth Gindrat Thorington, a daughter of Winifred Ann Pilcher Thorington and Robert D. Thorington of Montgomery, Ala., was married yesterday to Stephen Arthur Mongillo III, a son of Mary Gail Scanlon Mongillo and Mr. Mongillo of Hamden, Conn. The Rev. Craig Townsend performed the ceremony at St. James' Episcopal Church in New York.

Ms. Thorington, who is keeping her name, is a regional manager of underwriting for Merrill Lynch & Company in New York. She graduated from Duke University and received an M.B.A. from the University of Pennsylvania. Her father is the senior partner in Thorington & Gregory, a Montgomery law firm.

Mr. Mongillo is a managing director and investment banker in telecommunications at Bear, Stearns & Company in New York. He graduated from Trinity College in Hartford and received an M.B.A. from Dartmouth. His father, who works in New Haven, is a vice president of Tucker Anthony, the brokerage concern.
